senses.sense_definition: The capital city of the state of Alabama, United States.

examples.text: The historic bus boycott in <w>Montgomery</w> sparked a major civil rights movement.
She moved to <w>Montgomery</w> last year to work for the state government.
Mr. <w>Montgomery</w> has been teaching mathematics at the high school for twenty years.
The <w>Montgomery</w> family donated a large sum to the local library.

senses.sense_definition: Field Marshal Bernard Law Montgomery (1887â€“1976), a senior British Army officer who fought in both World Wars.

examples.text: General <w>Montgomery</w> played a crucial role in the Allied victory in North Africa.
Historians often analyze the military strategies employed by <w>Montgomery</w> during the war.
<w>Montgomery</w> Clift was a celebrated American actor known for his intense performances.
They decided to name their newborn son <w>Montgomery</w> after his grandfather.

senses.sense_definition: A historic town in Powys, Wales.

examples.text: We visited the ruins of the old castle on the hill above <w>Montgomery</w>.
The town of <w>Montgomery</w> is located near the border between Wales and England.
